attributes.action: Remove the Requirement for Coach Frivers to Wear a Seatbelt
attributes.additional_details:
To remove the Legal Requirement for Drivers of Large Passenger Vehicles 'Buses & Coaches' to wear a seat belt, Drivers Seatbelts restrict the movement of the Driver and hinders access to the controls not immediatly within the Drivers Reach.
It also prevents a quick response in the event of an Attack or Incident on board the vehicle or in the event of accident, in the event of a head-on collision the Driver needs the option to abandon the driving seat should there be no other option left to save his life and assist everyone afterwards, A Dead Driver is of No use.
